content.question: When two resistors, each of resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, are connected in series to a battery, the total power dissipated by the resistors is <math alttext="P sub s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mi>s</mi></msub></math>. What is the total power dissipated by the resistors if they are connected in parallel to the same battery?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
